name: Keyana Smith
text: Must be the day because every time I go I never have an issue. My order has never been wrong and everyone was always pleasant. For the size of the pizza and quality the price is perfect. Great for something quick or parties.

name: Stephen Kinkade
text: Terrible Service. Even if you are a college or high school student looking for a Hot N Ready Pizza, hot pizza cannot exist if no pizzas are ready. Stopped in around 3:00 pm on a Saturday. I was the only person in line, and others were …More

name: George Reed
text: Everyone is thinking it. I’ll just say it. F*** this place. The employees suck. The food is good. It’s hard to get food. If the didn’t hire drama queens and pay them 2$ an hour maybe it wouldn’t suck.

name: C Mongler
text: would be nice if the damn place was open i guess they dont care about getting money

name: Ashley Brenner
text: They don't even deserve 1 star. I ordered a cheese crust pizza to get home with no crust. Then to realize the pizza was no where near cooked, still complete dough. They only had 1 person working who could hardly keep up with how busy they …More

name: Heather Mann
text: I would like a call from a supervisor or manager about having my gift cards refunded since I work longer hours than you are open and of I try to call more then 10 mins before you 5PM close time on a Saturday evening your employees ignore …More

name: Robin Cheal
text: Told I would have to wait 25 minutes for the Hot and Ready to go pizza. Very unorganized and impolite. I left.

name: miss Pixi
text: I would give less than 1 star. They are always closed way too early, so it’s impossible to get dinner here and the pizzas are always hit or miss. It’s either good or way undercooked.

name: R S
text: Food was good and the guy at the register was nice enough, but the restaurant seems filthy. Tables were dirty, area near fountain drink machine was filthy. If I had realized that before I ordered, I probably wouldn't have eaten here. The …More

name: Kimberly Mease
text: If I could give them no stars I would. They close early, don't have product that they are supposed to have and they are rude to their customers. Don't recommend.

name: Brian Wright
text: I once attempted to order one large cheese and one large pepperoni pizza, the kid behind the counter said "Uh... can you like just get two cheeses 'cause thats all I have baking right now..." WHAT?! …More

name: BauerKillz
text: If I could give this location zero stars, I would.  Previously I ordered from here 1 time and despite requesting, multiple times, that my food be cooked well done it was doughy at best and completely raw at worst.  I always have a "try two …More

name: Jill Lovinger
text:
Customer service 101
Step 1: Acknowledge the customer's arrival.  A general statement can be something as simple as "We will be right with you."

name: Nate Goodwin
text: When its open its great, but they are randomly closed for no specified reason, even during their normal hours.

name: britany fillmore
text: I went and got pizza today and my pizza was so greasy and not a normal looking pizza it made me sick! I always loved little caesars!

name: david leathe
text: hours of service online do not reflect actual hours of service they close 2 hours earlier than made aware wasted a trip

name: Brad Mutek
text: The wait was not bad, but the service from the people could have been better. I waited 5 minutes while standing at the register for someone to acknowledge me.

name: Monica Hursh
text: Worst little ceasars ever. Slow service. Both times I went it was a 30 min wait for crazy bread.  When I got my order the pizza was not fresh either. Very disappointed with this location

name: Sarah Mitch
text: They advertise Hot N Ready, but don't actually do it.  We ordered ahead, came on time, and still had to wait 10 minutes for a pizza that is supposed to be Hot N Ready.  Also, what kind of pizza place closes at 8:00?

name: Jessica Klock
text: Good pizza usually pretty quick and friendly

name: Trevor Bare
text: Staff was nice, but they had no Pizza - 40 minute wait.  I suggest calling ahead.

name: Angel Mia Methax
text: The foods good but employees are inpatient.

name: Ben Donahower
text: I might be the only one that loves this place, but five dollar hot and ready pizzas are hard to beat when I want to feed guests cheap and quick or in the occasion that I don't feel like cooking

name: Tiara Bulluck
text: They  stingy with their tomato sauce

name: Allison VanDeurson
text: Called for over 20 mins no answer!!! Finally called kmart and they said they were closing at 4! It was 3:20 and the business hours are 11am to 8pm....The people are rude to boot

name: Tim Tylwalk
text: Waited 40 minutes to get my pizza and it was the worng pizza. They offered a free pizza on my next visit

name: Zach Nowland
text: Stay open later. Atleast on Friday and Saturday. Leymones is open untill 11 pm Friday night

text: No hairnets no clean tables just not a good place to eat

name: rockinzman
text: Best cheese bread around

name: Mark Tuscan
text: They suck went there the past couples days and the been closed early i think they need to hire new people n top of that they never have pizza ready you always have to wait....

name: Bill Coco
text: Worst place ever sloppiness terrible customer service always running out of pizza dough do not recommend at all!!!

name: Kyle Fry
text: Very frustrated. They were closed during their stated hours of operation for no reason. Suppose they don't wanna work. Oh well.

name: Aaron MLG
text: Horrible service, orders are always wrong, phone never gets answered. Seems like there is never any management around when I go in.

name: Tami Rodriguez
text: Poor service even worse state inspection

name: brandan sheaffer
text: Worst place to order pizza last time I ordered it sucked, was chewy and uncooked so I tried one more time and it was worse the wait was terrible by the time I got the pizza it was cold never again!

name: Allise Pierce
text: Most disrespectful and rude workers, and they always get my order wrong when I call ahead. I wouldn't even give it one star if that was an option!
